mapper.select: select count(users.id) as totalUsers, count(if(timediff(now(), users.lastTime) < '00:10:00', 1, null)) as totalOnlineUsers, (select count(id) from posts) as totalPosts, (select count(id) from posts where timediff(now(), posts.datetime) < '24:00:00') as totalNewPosts from users
select *, (select level_name from level where users.experience >= experience order by experience desc limit 1) as level_name from users where role = 0
